fullplot: Suffering from acute kidney failure, Uncle Boonmee has chosen to spend his final days surrounded by his loved ones in the countryside. Surprisingly, the ghost of his deceased wife appears to care for him, and his long lost son returns home in a non-human form. Contemplating the reasons for his illness, Boonmee treks through the jungle with his family to a mysterious hilltop cave - the birthplace of his first life.
plot: On his deathbed, Uncle Boonmee recalls his many past lives.
title: Uncle Boonmee Who Can Recall His Past Lives
writers: Phra Sripariyattiweti (inspired by the book of)
